person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Takuya Takagi headed the winner in the 88th minute of the group C game after goalkeeper Salem Bitar spoiled a mistake-free display by allowing the ball to slip under his body .

Let's think step by step.

1. Takuya Takagi - a person who headed the winner in the 88th minute of the game.
2. Salem Bitar - a person who was the goalkeeper in the game and made a mistake that allowed the goal to be scored.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
